- Title | Digital Finance
- Course Number | ...

Full name: 	Tong Thi Hao Tam				Title:
Address: Room 1311, A1 Building
Phone number: 	0913.520.505			Email: Tamtth@neu.edu.vn
Full name: 	Tong Thi Minh Ngoc				Title:
Address: Room 1311, A1 Building
Phone number: 	                         		Email: Ngoctm@neu.edu.vn

Neobanks, cryptocurrencies, crowdfunding etc transformed the financial sector and created new opprtunities for all stakeholders - along with new challenges. The main question is: How can this tectonic shift be used for the benefit of all stakeholders of the financial sector, traditional and digital banks, customers and the state? The goal of the course is to get the students acquainted with the dramatic changes in the financial sector generated by the digital revolution.
[1]. Digital Finance, Perry H. Beaumont, Routledge, 2020.

3. COURSE DESCRIPTIONS
Neobanks, cryptocurrencies, crowdfunding etc transformed the financial sector and created new opprtunities for all stakeholders - along with new challenges. The main question is: How can this tectonic shift be used for the benefit of all stakeholders of the financial sector, traditional and digital banks, customers and the state? The goal of the course is to get the students acquainted with the dramatic changes in the financial sector generated by the digital revolution.

9. COURSE REQUIREMENTS AND EXPECTATION
9.1. Attendance Requirements
- Students are required to fully take part in class lectures and activities.
- Students are allowed to be absent maximum 30% of the class hours.Students who is absent over 30% is not qualified to take the final exam.
9.2. In-class Behavior Requirements
- The course is carried out with respect to both lecturer and students. All behaviorthatmight adversely affectthe stakeholders are prohibited.
- Students need to be in class on time. Students being late for more than 10 minutes will not be eligible to take part in the session.
- Cellphone, laptop, tablet are only accepted for the purposes of taking notes of the lectures, preparing course assignments, not for anyother entertainment purposes while in class duration.
